Package uk.ac.ed.inf

Class SingletonAccess

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.ed.inf.SingletonAccess
public class SingletonAccess extends Object
This class is used to ensure the singleton access pattern is used to retrieve the Central Area coordinates

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static ArrayList<LngLat>
    centralAreaCoOrds
    Arraylist used to store the coordinates of the central area's vertices as a list of LngLat objects

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ArrayList<LngLat>
    getCentralAreaCoOrds()
    This method is the getter function of the centralAreaCoOrds, which consist of the list containing the coordinates of the central area.

    This method returns the only instance of the singleton class, if it exists.

  • Field Details

    • centralAreaCoOrds

      public static ArrayList<LngLat> centralAreaCoOrds
      Arraylist used to store the coordinates of the central area's vertices as a list of LngLat objects

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static SingletonAccess getInstance()
      This method returns the only instance of the singleton class, if it exists. In the case that no instances exist, a new instance is made.
      Returns:
      the instance of the SingletonAccess class

    • readCentralArea

      public void readCentralArea()
      This method is used to read from the REST Server and storing the coordinates of the central area vertices in centralAreaCoOrds

    • getCentralAreaCoOrds

      public ArrayList<LngLat> getCentralAreaCoOrds()
      This method is the getter function of the centralAreaCoOrds, which consist of the list containing the coordinates of the central area.
      Returns:
      the list of coordinates of the central area.
